duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare surfaces through abrasive blast and power tool cleaning as per paint manufacturer recommendations.
Paint equipment and structures for protection and cosmetic purposes.
Maintain, mix, and have thorough knowledge of paint and other coating materials.
Identify tools required for tasks and safety risks, and mix paint/coatings as required.
Work at heights and off of ladders/scaffolds safely, and clean up work areas.

education_certification.credential: 4+ years working as a Painter or Painter Helper on an industrial construction project. Formal/Technical education preferred.
